{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_ClearFlash'''
(''no parameter'')
Stops the current flash state from playing. Essentially identical to doing the following: XBOW A 3 A_GunFlash("LightDone",GFF_NOEXTCHANGE) This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|StrifeCrossbow}} and derived classes.
